text.text_translated:
Feedback is when managers tell people about their work. Managers give feedback to help people. Many managers want to make bad feedback sound better. They put bad feedback between two good comments. This is like a sandwich.

But managers do this often. It becomes a usual way to give feedback. Then, people start to think. They think good comments just make bad things seem better. So, people do not believe the good feedback. The good feedback loses its power.

Good feedback should not just make bad things softer. It should make good work stronger. It should help people do good work again.

Managers want to make their feedback positive.
Many managers use a special way. They put bad feedback between two good comments. This is like a sandwich.
But managers do this often. It becomes a normal way to give feedback.
Then, people start to think in a new way.
They think good comments just make bad things seem good.
So, people do not believe the good feedback. It loses its worth.
Good feedback should not just hide bad things.
